messages.title: A decade of Austerity – a Tory/Lib Dem Choice!
messages.content: Universal Credit, the benefit freeze and two-child limit are causing hardship for families. I am leading a campaign for separate payments to protect those suffering domestic abuse. The SNP Scottish Government has been commended by the UN for using their limited powers to alleviate Tory benefit cuts and support the most vulnerable – through the Scottish Welfare Fund, Scottish Child Payment and mitigation of the Bedroom Tax. Despite our efforts, more children are growing up in poverty due to the 2012 UK Government Welfare cuts.

messages.title: Brexit is BAD for Scotland - Deal or No Deal!
messages.content: Tariffs, additional bureaucracy and delays will hit key local industries like Aerospace, Pharmaceuticals, Farming and Fishing – costing jobs and shrinking the public purse. Loss of EU citizens will cause staff shortages in our NHS, Tourism and Agricultural sectors – there has already been a 90% drop in EU nurses coming to the UK. Friction at borders threatens the smooth supply of Medicines and Radioisotopes and a Post Brexit US Trade Deal could more than double drug costs for our NHS. Lower safety, environmental and food standards would pose a risk to Public Health.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning against Universal Credit, the benefit freeze, and the two-child limit. Advocating for separate payments to protect those suffering domestic abuse.
The SNP Scottish Government mitigates Tory benefit cuts through the Scottish Welfare Fund, Scottish Child Payment, and mitigation of the Bedroom Tax.
Opposing Brexit due to its negative impact on local industries, NHS, tourism, and agricultural sectors.
Boris Johnson's Tory Party is a threat to devolution. Protecting the powers of the Scottish Parliament.

issues.health: Loss of EU citizens will cause staff shortages in our NHS. Friction at borders threatens the smooth supply of Medicines and Radioisotopes.
issues.socialWelfare: Universal Credit, the benefit freeze and two-child limit are causing hardship for families. More children are growing up in poverty due to the 2012 UK Government Welfare cuts.

leaflet.personalStatement: I hope you will again put your trust in me as your MP.

politicalExperience.achievements: Challenging the Health threats from Brexit – loss of EU staff and medicine shortages along with rising child and pensioner poverty due to Tory Austerity.

contactInformation.address: Both at The Hub, 183 High Street, Irvine KA12 8AD.
